job_title: Director of Business Development and Product Management
job_description:
Director of Business Development and Product Management

Madison, IN, USA Req #496
Tuesday, February 6, 2024

Job Title: Director of Business Development and Product Management

Creation date: 1/16/2024

Salary Grade:

Classification: Exempt

Supervises Others: Yes

Reports to: Chief Operating Officer

Job Role/Summary:

The Director of Business Development and Product Management is responsible for monetizing market insight and overseeing the growth and evolution of the company through effective go to market and market acquisition strategy and product portfolio management.

This role requires relevant skills and experience in market analytics (including customer, competition, and product offerings), business building and product management. Drives company to a market orientation that gets Grote closer to its customers.

This role will oversee the product life cycle and work with sales, engineering, and manufacturing to make decisions on end of life, improvements, and other product changes as are necessary to meet the business needs.

Job Responsibilities:

PEOPLE
• Team building and development
• Performance management
• Creation of the intellectual capital required for effective Business Development and Product Management

PROCESS and TOOLS
• Go to Market Strategy
• Market Acquisition Strategy
• Product Management
• Value Proposition Canvas

OUTCOMES

Secondary

Quality:
• Develop and maintain the quality and integrity of BD and PM intellectual capital.

Responsibility & Customer-Focused:
• Develop and execute business development plans to drive revenue growth and expand the customer base.
• Ability to teach Business Development tools and processes as well as lead a BD team.
• Identify market trends and customer needs to inform product development and enhancement strategies.
• Conduct competitive analyses to identify opportunities for differentiation and positioning of the company's products.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including sales, marketing, and operations, to drive alignment and effective execution of product strategies.
• Develop and manage strategic partnerships and alliances to expand the company's reach and market share.
• Monitor and evaluate industry trends and competitor activities to identify potential threats and opportunities.
• Develop pricing strategies and value propositions that maximize profitability and customer satisfaction.
• Define and track key performance indicators to measure the success of business development and product management initiatives.
• Manage the product lifecycle, from ideation and development to launch and post-launch support.
• Lead a team of product managers and business development professionals, providing guidance and support to achieve departmental goals.
• Collaborate with all locations and necessary stakeholders to create and present a 3-5-year strategic plan for product development and expected customer needs and requirements.

Integrity:
• Timely execution of project plans, programs and insight development.
• Completes special projects with intent of achieving corporate plans and goals.

Other Functions:
• Required to follow any other instructions and to perform any other duties as requested by supervisor.

Attributes and Competencies:
• Quality Driven
• Respectful
• Honesty
• Customer Driven
• Responsible
• Innovative
• Responsible Corporate Citizen
• Team Player
• Building Winning Teams
• Positive Attitude
• Detail Oriented
• Effective Communication
• Results Oriented
• Process Improvement

Competencies:
• Market Analytics (tools and processes that expose risk and exploit revenue stream opportunities - ie. monetize market insight through product and service revenue streams).
• Product Management
• Networking - partner development
• Business building - analytics, modelling and scaling
• Building winning teams (this extends beyond the BD/PM function to internal x-functional, supplier and customer collaboration)
• Education, Experience, Training, Certifications and Licenses:

Degree or equivalent experience:
• Bachelor's degree in business administration, marketing, or a related field. Master's degree preferred.

Years of experience:
• 7+ years of industry experience required in Business Development and Product Management (min 3 years in a leadership capacity)
• BD and PM Methods and Tools development and implementation at scale
• Strategy deployment (Hoshin, OKR, BSC)
• Lean / Agile product and service development
• M&A

Must successfully pass any pre-screening test(s).

Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities:

Knowledge in:
• BD methods and tools, such as Business Market Canvas, Customer Journey Map, Value Proposition Canvas, Competitive analysis, marketing and sales (ie. pitching and closing), others
• Product Management - vision (value prop/ BMC), design (mapping, PRD), strategy (product/market fit), and execution (OKR)
• product management principles, including market research, competitive analysis, and product lifecycle management

Skills in:
• Strong analytical and strategic thinking skills, with the ability to interpret market data and trends to inform business decisions.
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build and maintain relationships with key stakeholders.
• Proven leadership abilities, with experience managing teams and driving cross-functional collaboration.
• Strong negotiation and influencing skills to drive partnerships and alliances.

Demonstrated ability to:
• Ability to interact with all levels of employees.
• Work at a highly motivated level with a sense of urgency and dedication to accomplishing tasks. < self-directed
• Adapt to frequent changes in work environment & prioritization.
• Work with general or minimal supervision.

Experience with:
• Conflict resolution
• In-depth problem identification, analysis and resolution
• Prioritizing and executing multiple projects

Other:
• Must be proficient with Microsoft 365 / Office applications and data analysis tools.
• Social media (omni-channel) platforms, collaboration and project management platforms (MS Teams and Smartsheet), analytics (PowerBI, CRM)
• Travel:
• As needed

Other details
• Job Family Executive - US
• Pay Type Salary
• Travel Required Yes
• Required Education Bachelor's Degree
Apply Now
